lines.text: Those who are destined to live during times of war and social upheaval are victims of cruel fate ~~ unable to find comfort in the past or peace in the present. They are the spiritual orphans of the world.
We shall drink to the past, forget the future, and pleasantly live the present!
Sometimes the great house of Bonnyfeather becomes too heavy a burden for one man's shoulders.
I dare say you wish you'd never left Versailles. You had a very pleasant time at court with those gallant young officers. With one in particular, I recall.
